questions: Describe a time when you had to solve a complex problem for a client. What was your approach?
How would you go about estimating the market size for a new product?
Walk me through how you would structure an analysis for a company considering entering a new market.
Explain the concept of object-oriented programming and provide an example.
How would you design a scalable system for a social media platform?
Describe a challenging bug you've encountered and how you solved it.
How would you value a company that has negative earnings?
Explain the difference between NPV and IRR. When would you use each?
Walk me through the three financial statements and how they are interconnected.
Describe a successful marketing campaign you've worked on. What made it effective?
How would you measure the ROI of a social media marketing campaign?
What strategies would you use to enter a new market with an existing product?
